thread.title: British Stocks are Having Their Moment in the Sun

author: Chelsey Dulaney
title: British Stocks are Having Their Moment in the Sun
text: Investors looking for a place to ride out market volatility might find shelter in an unlikely place: the British stock market. The benchmark U.K. index, the FTSE 100, has been outperforming global indexes in recent weeks as trade tensions, fears over heightened regulation of the technology sector and geopolitical worries have rocked the broader market.
